name: Saltwyk
tagline: The payment network that helps merchants prosper

category.positioning: We compete in the mental space of Visa, Mastercard, Stripe (payment rails). We create a new category: networks where earned value flows instead of debt.

brandPromise: Saltwyk is the payment network that helps merchants prosper. Unlike credit cards that tax merchants for market access, Saltwyk is a customer acquisition engine that increases margins while reducing payment costs. We make earned value liquid across a network, creating prosperity for both merchants and shoppers without debt.

principles.name: Anti-Extraction Ethos
principles.description: Saltwyk exists to help merchants prosper, not to tax them. Credit cards extract value from merchants to enable shopper credit. Saltwyk creates value for merchants through customer acquisition and margin improvement.
principles.nonNegotiable: Never position Saltwyk as extractive infrastructure

principles.name: Anti-Debt Principle
principles.description: Shoppers should spend what they've earned, not what they'll owe. Debt is not a feature, it's a failure. Saltwyk enables spending existing value, not creating obligations.
principles.nonNegotiable: Never enable or promote debt-based transactions

principles.name: Network-First Economics
principles.description: Value comes from connections, not from controlling the asset. More merchants + more shoppers = exponentially more value for all participants. We win when the network wins.
principles.nonNegotiable: Never pursue strategies that trade network health for short-term revenue

principles.name: Earned Value Liquidity
principles.description: Points should flow like money - instantly, universally, with no forced conversion. We make earned value liquid so it can be spent before it expires.
principles.nonNegotiable: Never compromise transaction speed or success rate for other goals

principles.name: Merchant Empowerment
principles.description: Merchants should control their economics, not be at the mercy of banks or platforms. We provide infrastructure that merchants use on their terms.
principles.nonNegotiable: Never remove merchant control or transparency

stage1.name: Penetration
stage1.primaryMessage: Accept points as payment, reduce credit card fees
strategy: Focus on payment acceptance value prop
Build case studies on fee reduction
targetProofPoints: Z% reduction in credit card processing volume

stage2.name: Margin Recovery
stage2.primaryMessage: Recover 20-30% margins by replacing discount-driven sales
strategy: Armed with merchant data on margin improvement
Shift narrative from cost savings to revenue growth
Command premium pricing with proven ROI

stage3.name: TAM Expansion
stage3.primaryMessage: The network where earned value flows - from any brand, any program
strategy: Expand beyond merchant loyalty to employee rewards

rewardsCommerce.definition: Transactions powered by loyalty points instead of credit

customerAcquisitionEngine.definition: Saltwyk drives discovery, not just payment

villains.name: Credit Card Networks
villains.description: Extract 2-3% fees from every transaction. Built to tax merchants for access to customers. Enable debt, not prosperity.

villains.name: Discount Dependency
villains.description: Merchants lose 20-30% margins to promotional discounting. Race-to-bottom dynamics destroy category profitability.

advantages: Merchant-funded settlement → Capital-efficient, no float required
Platform-native distribution → Fast network density (Shopify apps)
Network effects → Value grows exponentially with connections
Customer acquisition engine → Not just payment, but discovery
competitivePositioning.whiteSpace: The intersection of payment infrastructure + customer acquisition + network effects for mid-market DTC merchants

style: Lead with TAM and market opportunity

stage1.headline: Accept rewards from everywhere. Attract shoppers from anywhere.
stage1.subhead: Your shoppers can finally use their Target points, airline miles, and hotel rewards to buy from you. You settle instantly, without discounting.
keyMessages: New Payment Method: Accept points from any brand's loyalty program
Customer Acquisition: Get discovered by shoppers with points to spend
Cost Savings: Reduce credit card fees on rewards-powered transactions
Zero Risk: No capital required, instant settlement, no discount needed
Simple Integration: One-click Shopify app, live in minutes

stage2.headline: Stop discounting. Start prospering.
stage2.subhead: Merchants in the Saltwyk network recover 20-30% margins by eliminating discount dependency. Shoppers pay with points. You keep full price.
keyMessages: Margin Recovery: Data-proven 20-30% improvement
Discount Elimination: Shoppers don't need deals when using found money
Premium Positioning: Maintain brand value, not race to bottom
Network Effects: More merchants = more shopper utility = more activity
Case Studies: Real brands, real results

messaging.headline: Shop with what you've already earned.
messaging.subhead: Use your Target points, airline miles, hotel rewards, and more to buy from thousands of brands. Before they expire.
keyPhrases: Pay with points (not redeem, not convert)
keyMessages: Spend Before Expiry: Don't lose points you've earned
Universal Acceptance: One wallet, any brand in network
Found Money Feeling: Buying with points, not debt
Fast Checkout: As quick as Apple Pay
No Credit Required: Spend what you have, not what you'll owe

style: No metaphors (no salt, no clearinghouse poetry)

messaging.headline: Build on universal rewards clearing rails.
messaging.subhead: One API. Instant settlement. Any loyalty program.
keyMessages: Simple Integration: RESTful API, clear documentation
Instant Settlement: Real-time clearing, no batch processing
Universal Support: Works with any loyalty program
Transparent Economics: Clear fee structure, no hidden costs
Developer Experience: Modern tooling, helpful support

system.name: Intaglio Ink + Ledger Paper + Security Threads
communicates: Permanence → Ink that doesn't fade = durable network
Authenticity → Security threads = real value, not synthetic credit
